channel.title: Massacred World ECONOMY!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/20ppvrn.png[/img]
Welcome to Massacred World! I've created a new server based off soulsplit and (just like the version with the new era base) I'm trying to make it as unique and as enjoyable as I possibly can. I would enjoy feedback.
[B][U]EXP RATE CURRENTLY: X2[/U][/B]
Full Gambling System
[IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/9994/clip1waa043.gif[/img]
Godwars
[IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/9477/advertpic.png[/img]
Random Events:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/rjl9on.png[/img]
Home:
[IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/9875/homevm.png[/img]
Highscores:
[IMG]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/4230/highscorespk.png[/img] [IMG]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/3307/topskillers.png[/img]
Resetting Stats:
[IMG]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/2315/resetstats.png[/img] [IMG]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/9219/resetchoice.png[/img] [IMG]http://img574.imageshack.us/img574/3670/attackreset.png[/img]
Locking EXP:
[IMG]http://img242.imageshack.us/img242/9061/lockexp.png[/img] [IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/5883/lockedexp.png[/img]
[B]More coming soon! Updated as often as possible![/B]
[IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/7965/nicem.gif[/img]
Thank you for checking out my thread :D[/CENTER]

item.title: Massacred World ECONOMY!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Unfortunately, I have to agree with Thug-Life, I have nothing against him; don’t get me wrong.
But, random events are in the top 5 most hated things in RuneScape, maybe.
Defeating that purpose in a private server makes it, ‘uncomfortable’ to play.
If you only created the ‘random’ event that most people use for autoers, like that:
‘Please select … skill’
It could be better.
And loading 508 models into a 317 server, not of my taste.
If this project is successful, I don’t intend to join it.
But as it is not my server, do as you wish.

Read full topic

item.title: Massacred World ECONOMY!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

DemisePking:

When did you play?

I’m talking about your code; it’s terrible, all of your servers have been the same and I doubt that this will be no different.

p.s: you seem to make a new server every week?

Read full topic

item.title: Massacred World ECONOMY!
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

Thug-life:

Random events? One of the most hated things about Runescape? Yay for defeating the one of the main advantages of the idea of a private server!

People were staying up overnight autoclick thieving? What do you think im going to do.

Primadude:

All content, no quality.

When did you play?

Read full topic
